Texts.Eng:
A race of clever colonial foxes.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% Speed & Jump
  Fall Damage x^green;0.9^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +20^reset;% Cold, Fire and Electric
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Moderate Heat/Cold, Slush, Snow, Jungle tiles, Sandstorms.

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Forest, jungle and plains type biomes: Defense x^green;1.15^reset;
  Alien/Fungus/Proto/Penumbra/Toxic/Radioactive: Health and Damage x^red;0.85^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Shortsword, Shortspear, Spear, Rapier: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Sniper Rifle: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Shadow, Radiation and Cosmic, -^red;50^reset;% Knockback
Texts.Chs:
一群聪明的殖民地狐狸。

^orange;饮食^reset;：杂食，可食生肉

^orange;天赋^reset;：
+^green;15 ^reset;%速度和跳跃
掉落伤害x ^green;0.9 ^reset;
 ^green;抗性^reset;：+20 ^reset;%寒冷、火、电抗性
^cyan;免疫^reset;：中等冷热、泥泞、雪、丛林瓦片、沙尘暴。

^orange;环境^reset;：
森林、丛林和平原类型生物群落：防御x ^green;1.15 ^reset;
异星/真菌/原生物/半影生物/有毒/辐射：健康和损害x ^red;0.85 ^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
短剑，短枪，矛，猛禽：伤害x ^green;1.1 ^reset;
狙击步枪：+^green;2 ^reset;%暴击率

^red;弱点^reset;：
 ^red;抗性^reset;：-^red;40 ^reset;%毒抗，-^red;20 ^reset;%暗影，辐射与宇宙射线抗性，-^red;50 ^reset;%反伤
